languages.text: Лицо трупа искусно срезано, но вы узнаете его по костюму. На этого дворянина покушался портной, которому вы даровали свободу.
The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.
languages.original_text: Лицо трупа искусно срезано, но вы узнаете его по костюму. На этого дворянина покушался портной, которому вы даровали свободу.

traits.locale_text: The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.
The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.
The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.
The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.
The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.

languages.text: Das Gesicht der Leiche wurde geschickt abgeschnitten, aber du erkennst sie anhand der Kleidung. Dieser Adlige wurde von dem Schneider ermordet, den du gehen lassen hast.
languages.original_text: The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.

traits.locale_text: Das Gesicht der Leiche wurde geschickt abgeschnitten, aber du erkennst sie anhand der Kleidung. Dieser Adlige wurde von dem Schneider ermordet, den du gehen lassen hast.

languages.text: Si le visage de la victime a été prélevé avec soin, vous la reconnaissez à sa tenue. Cet aristocrate a été assassiné par le tailleur que vous avez remis en liberté.
languages.original_text: The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.

traits.locale_text: Si le visage de la victime a été prélevé avec soin, vous la reconnaissez à sa tenue. Cet aristocrate a été assassiné par le tailleur que vous avez remis en liberté.

languages.text: 这具尸体的脸被巧妙地切掉了，但你通过尸体的衣服辨认出了他的身份。这位贵族被你放走的那个裁缝杀害了。
languages.original_text: The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.

traits.locale_text: 这具尸体的脸被巧妙地切掉了，但你通过尸体的衣服辨认出了他的身份。这位贵族被你放走的那个裁缝杀害了。

languages.text: Se ha cortado con destreza la cara del cadáver, pero puedes reconocerlo por sus ropajes. Este noble ha sido asesinado a manos del sastre al que permitiste marchar.
languages.original_text: The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.

traits.locale_text: Se ha cortado con destreza la cara del cadáver, pero puedes reconocerlo por sus ropajes. Este noble ha sido asesinado a manos del sastre al que permitiste marchar.

languages.text: 死体の顔は巧妙に切り取られているが、その服装から身元に気付く。これは、あなたが解放した仕立屋に殺された貴族だった。
languages.original_text: The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.

traits.locale_text: 死体の顔は巧妙に切り取られているが、その服装から身元に気付く。これは、あなたが解放した仕立屋に殺された貴族だった。

languages.text: Cesedin yüzü ustaca kesilmiş olsa da giydiği kıyafetlerden cesedi tanıyorsun. Bu soylu, serbest bırakılmasına izin verdiğin terzi tarafından katledilmiş.
languages.original_text: The face of the corpse has been skilfully cut off, but you recognise him by his outfit. This nobleman was murdered by the tailor you allowed to go free.

traits.locale_text: Cesedin yüzü ustaca kesilmiş olsa da giydiği kıyafetlerden cesedi tanıyorsun. Bu soylu, serbest bırakılmasına izin verdiğin terzi tarafından katledilmiş.
